Summary: Wir waren hier für eine Nacht. Die Anreise mit dem Auto verlief Problemlos. Das Hotel liegt direkt an einer mehrspurigen Hauptstraße, aber vom Verkehr hört man bei geschlossenem Fenster gar nichts. Parkplätze sind ausreichend vorhanden.  Die Dame am Empfang war sehr freundlich, und das einchecken verlief sehr zügig. Unser Zimmer war im ersten Stock und es war sehr sauber. Die vorhanden Geräte wie z. B. der Fernseher, die Klimaanlage, oder der Fön funktionierten einwandfrei. Das Zimmer schien auch erst vor kurzem neu eingerichtet worden zu sein. Es gibt neben einer Kaffeemaschine auch eine Mikrowelle und einen Kühlschrank. Im Zimmer gab es für mich nur einen Minuspunkt, und zwar lies sich das Fenster nicht öffnen. Es gibt zwar eine Klimaanlage, aber man will ja doch ab und zu mal
Manager Response: Sehr geehrter Herr Friese1984,   vielen Dank, dass Sie uns Ihre Eindrücke von Ihrem letzten Aufenthalt in unserem Holiday Inn Express Anaheim West mitteilen.    Ich freue mich sehr, dass die Lage unseres Hotels, Ihr Check-in Erlebnis und der Service unserer Angestellten Ihren Erwartungen entsprochen haben. Wir bemühen uns, Ihnen den bestmöglichen Service und die bestmögliche Erfahrung zu bieten, und es ist immer toll, von unseren geschätzten Gästen zu hören. Ich nehme auch Ihre Bemerkung über unser Frühstück zur Kenntnis. Bitte seien Sie versichert, dass wir Ihre Kommentare dazu verwenden werden, um unser Team zu informieren, damit wir Ihnen in Zukunft eine bessere Erfahrung zu bieten. Ich entschuldige mich, wenn dies Ihnen Unannehmlichkeiten bereitet haben könnte.   Nochmals vielen Dank, dass Sie sich für einen Aufenthalt bei uns entschieden haben. Wir würden uns freuen, wenn Sie uns in Zukunft wieder besuchen.   Mit freundlichen Grüßen   Ben W. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: It’s an old building so I try to take that into account but I couldn’t get past the stains on the sheets and the overall feeling of “I can’t touch anything without feeling dirty.” It’s the worst to feel uncomfortable all night but too late once we arrived to change hotels, so we moved to another room and asked for an extra set of sheets and put those over what was on the bed as an extra layer of protection. The good is the beds were comfortable. The breakfast wasn’t bad. Electricity went out during breakfast but luckily we were packed and ready to go. No one at front desk to check out and a line of customers so we left and will never be back.
Manager Response: Hi DebbieH530,  Thank you for leaving us feedback surrounding your experience with the Holiday Inn Express Anaheim West. We appreciate you choosing us and doing business with IHG.     Our goal is to provide the best lodging experience for every guest, and I'm sorry for the issues during your stay. I shared your feedback with our hotel management for review and I trust that prompt actions will be taken.       I hope we’ll remain to be your dependable choice, as we promise to make the value of your experience worth it for all the right reasons.      Sincerely,      Riz E.  Case Manager   IHGService

Summary: When I arrived, the driveway was blocked by police making arrests. They were handcuffing and loading subjects into their car. I didn't let that bother me. I'm glad the police are doing their job. But, the room wasn't very clean. The carpet was filthy and sticky. There were zero towels. When I checked in, someone was calling from their room for towels. Apparently all services are "on-demand only".  And the place was pretty noisy. I tolerate noise pretty well but this place was pretty noisy.
Manager Response: Dear C2H5OHFresno_CA,   I appreciate you for sharing your review about your recent stay.  I am truly sorry that you did not experience an exemplary hotel stay because of the level of service you have received. On behalf of our hotel, I apologize for the presence of the police on the property. This is not what we want any of our guests to experience. I have sent you a private message to reaffirm my apologies.  I very much hope that you will grant us the opportunity to prove ourselves again.  Best Regards,  Ben W. Case Manager IHGService

Summary: Friendly Staff. Expect the same breakfasts every morning and the pancake machine and juice machine, both broken. I booked two rooms for a family reunion. One of the few hotels in the area that offer Queen sized beds. The beds were comfy and pillows fully. The sheets and towels however were stiff. They also limited the towels to adults, did not include children in the room. We were always having to request more towels. They never collected the trash. We took it out ourselves. One room which my adult sons were staying in, had a broken lock on the door. The door was fixed the very next day. The toilet paper holder fell right off the wall. All bathrooms could use new flooring, its cracked. And bath could use new caulking. This hotel is a good 15 minute drive to Disneyland. I would
Room tip: Reserve several months in advance to get the best rates.
Manager Response: Hi Tina C,  Thank you for your visit to Holiday Inn Express Anaheim West. Our hotel is the perfect place to enjoy a quality stay in an environment of simplicity.   I read your comments and I am sorry for the issues during your stay. I know that this is not what you come to expect from a quality chain like ours. I send your message to our maintenance managers to be evaluated. We have created a plan to improve our services and offers.  I invited you to visit us on your next trip we know you won't regret it.    Warm greetings,  Oscar C. Case Manager IHG Service

Summary: Our first room had a smoke detector that chirped. We called downstairs and he said he would come up and fix it. We waited but nobody showed up. I went back downstairs and he was the only employee here, he had three people checking in. After we booked online with I HG, they added $15 for parking. I asked for another room. This rooms sink only had hot water.  Oh, and the sink didn’t drain. There is no breakfast and  attendant said the TVs don’t work. That’s it so far.
Manager Response: Hello babymarge,  I thank you for your stay and for writing about your experience. It's a pleasure hearing from one of our valued guests. Our team focuses on providing a great night's stay in an environment of simplicity and comfort.  I read your feedback and I am sorry for the issues with the TV’s, sink and fire detector among others. I understand that these issues can hindered your satisfaction. I shared your comments with our managing team and have taken steps to prevent these issues from happening again.   All of our team invite you to come and shared your next travel journey.  Warm regards,  Oscar C. Case Manager IHGService
